transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan mam ji hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan mam ji sapna sapna rastogi se baat kar rahe hain mam ji.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji sir good afternoon bataiye.
Executive: Bol rahe hain mam ji jo hamara jo lead hai na theek hai jo brush ka collection jo brush ka collection humne select kiya hai theek hai usme mam ji roller aur paint brush ka hamara koi kaam nahi hota hai mam ji normally lead aata hai aur waste ho jata hai mam.
Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai hamara shoe brush painting brush oyer brush theek hai ye sab hamara kaam ke hote hain mam par wo paint brush aur jo mam roller brush hai wo hamara koi kaam ka nahi hota mam ji pehli baat hai hamara sale bhi nahi hota mam.
Bas wo lead aata hai jyada se jyada waste ka hi lead aata hai mam ji isiliye bol rahe hain wo dono ko cancel karne ke liye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye jaise ki abhi main check kar pa rahi hu aapka jo category hai wo hai painting brush hai.
Customer: Haan wo to hai mam ji wo theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Aur shoes brush hai.
Customer: Haan shoe brush wo theek hai mam dono theek hai.
Executive: Artist brush ho gaya.
Customer: Haan artist brush wo bhi theek hai mam wo bhi theek hai.
Executive: Coil fiber coil fiber brush.
Customer: Haan wo theek hai.
Executive: Aur theek hai na sir abhi jaise paint brush mein paint brush ko humne abhi aapka matlab out of stock mark kar diya hai wooden wooden brush ho gaya wooden brush aapka hai fir flat paint brushes aapka hata diya gaya hai cleaning brushes cleaning brushes bhi aapka hata diya hai paint roller aapka hata diya.
Customer: Haan nahi mam ji cleaning brush theek hai paint roller ko aap hata dijiye roller ko hata dijiye mam ji theek hai.
Executive: Jaise cleaning brush mein sir wo matlab jaise aap samajh rahe hain na ki har tarike ke brushes jaise toilet ya har tarike ke brush aayenge cleaning brush mein to kya aap wo deal karte hain kya sir toilet brushes.
Customer: Coir coir coir mein cleaning brush aate hain mam theek hai ye banister brush.
Executive: But sir main ye bol rahi hu ki us category ke se fir aapko is tarike ki inquiries bhi aa sakti hain to kya aap deal karte hain sir cleaning brush matlab bottle cleaning bhi hota hai washroom cleaner brush bhi hota hai to ye na bahut wide aur generic category hai isliye jo main category hai usme to apna product hai hi na sir.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Ye ye main isliye bol rahi hu aapko.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Baki baki jaise sir paint roller aap humne already aapka hataya hua hai and fine art brushes sir ek category ye but ye hamare catalog mein added nahi hai sir to agar aap isme deal karte hain to isko add kar lijiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi mam ji paint brush jo hota hai na paint brush alag hota hai mam painting brush alag hota hai aap paint brush ko hata dijiye aur roller brush ko mam ji hata dijiye theek hai oyer brush rahega mam ji oyer brush theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai ye dono mam ji dono ka lead bahut jyada aata hai theek hai par hamara yaha pe sale nahi ho pata hai mam ji pehli baat hai theek hai aur ye jo cheez hai mam ji hamara to handmade cheez hai theek hai ye sab machine se bana hua cheez hai hamara yaha pe milta nahi hai hum sale bhi nahi karte mam ji theek hai.
Executive: Paint roller ko hata diya.
Customer: Nahi mam ji paint roller sir hata diya hai painting roller brushes bhi hata diya floor cleaning brush bhi aapka hai aur machine brushes aur premium paint kuch ye jo category hai ye aapki already hata di gayi hai sir yaha pe ek category aap mujhe ye aur confirm kar dijiye jo fine art brushes ek category hai ye kya fine art brushes mein aap deal karte hain kya sir wo jo chhote bache wo matlab paint wale brush hote hain chhote wale hote hain jo painting karte hain.
Executive: Karte hain na aap unme deal to unki koi image aap mujhe share kar do main ye wala product aapka add kara deti hu agar iski koi image aapke paas available hai to wo aap mujhe image de dijiye sir ye wala main add kara deti hu baki ye wali category aapki already yaha pe hati hui hai sir and sir mujhe ek cheez aur janna tha ye aapka ek third number hai aur aap matlab kya dekhte hain.
Customer: Kya mam ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir ye jo aapke number pe call connect karne ka request aapne raise kiya na ye unregistered number hai hamare sath to aap mujhe ye batayenge please ki ye matlab aap IndiaMART dekhte hain ya fir kya kyuki register number to dusre hain sir hamare paas aapne third number se request kiya hai.
Customer: Haan dusra number.
Executive: Wo mera bhai ka number hai mam ji wo abhi so raha hai isiliye number mein abhi aapko call kiya ye mera number hai.
Executive: Sir aap apna number bhi add kara lijiye kyuki sir dekhiye abhi to humne call connect kara hai but we are allowed to call registered number only so requested you to please add your number as a secondary or primary whatever you can do because sir wo third number we are not aise allow nahi hota hai hume call karna but aapka request aaya to humne aapki hat gayi hai sir and ye wala main add dungi aap mujhe mujhe whatsapp kar dijiye sir image ka photo ya fir catalog mein koi existing hai to main usme se add kar sakti hu.
Customer: Theek hai mam ji jo jo lagega mam ji aapko hum theek hai theek hai mam ji aapko hum photo share kar rahe hain whatsapp par theek hai aapko whatsapp.
Executive: Haan aap share kar rahi hu haan ji ji ji to wo main picture add karke sir ye jo aapne customer care pe call feedback share kiya tha aapki image add karke ye main aapka kar dungi plus sir main aapse ek request aur karna chahti hu jaise aapki review rating to achi hai sir matlab.
Customer: Haan mam ji.
Executive: Aap kar rahe hain lekin sir buyer ke na call bahut miss hote hain to kyuki aapka buyer ke number bhi na ek hi number added hai wo to aap aur number ko bhi matlab isme to sir aapne yahi number add karaya hua hai jo aap baat kar rahe ho lekin jo aapke brother ke number hai wo dono hate hue hain waha se.
Customer: Okay okay okay theek hai theek hai.
Executive: To aap aur number bhi add kar dijiye usme kyuki fir call miss rahega to usse aapko problem hogi sir hai na.
Customer: Okay okay mam theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap please abhi main ye kar deti hu sir but aapko request yahi hai mera please ko kar dijiye ye jo call miss ho raha hai iske liye aap buyer ke liye aur number bhi add kar sakte hain to main aapko guide kar du ki aap kaise buyer ke andar number ko add kar sakte ho seller panel ke through.
Customer: Haan haan haan buyer ka number mujhe hoga to achcha hoga mam ji theek hai.
Executive: Nahi to haan hamara hai na jyada se jyada lead mam ji paint brush aur roller brush mein nikal jata hai mam theek hai.
Executive: Sir ye nahi buyer ke liye jo buyer ki call aati hai na wo sirf ek hi number pe aa rahi hai abhi aapke baki kyuki ek hi number pe call aa rahi hai to wo miss bhi ho ja rahi hai sir to aap other number ko bhi add kariye preferred service number mein taki aapki koi call miss na ho aur buyer buyer ka call agar aapko proper rahega to aapki listing wagera bhi sahi rahegi sir main ye batane ki koshish karta hu.
Customer: Okay okay okay theek hai mam.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai mam ji aapko main whatsapp mein bhej raha hu.
Executive: Haan main whatsapp pe mere ko image bhej dijiye main add kar rahi hu aur sir ye iske baad na aapka ye jo request raise hua hai iska ek closer bhi aapke paas aayega please usko aap yes mark kar dijiyega theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay mam ji.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir.
Customer: Okay welcome mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove roller and paint brushes.

- Wants to add fine art brushes category.

- Call connected from unregistered number.

- Buyer calls are being missed.



Resolution:

- Paint roller and painting roller brushes removed.

- Cleaning brushes and floor cleaning brush removed.

- Executive asked to share image of fine art brushes.

- Executive requested to add registered number.

- Executive offered guidance on adding buyer number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share image on WhatsApp.

- Customer to mark request as ‘yes’.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- brushes, category, unregistered number, buyer calls
